content:
The minimum dimensions for a regulation $\,\text{FIFA}\,$ soccer field are $45\text{ m}$  wide by $90\,\text{m}$ long.  

**Draw a regulation soccer field with minimum dimensions in the coordinate plane with the upper-left corner at $(-45,35)$ so that the longer sides are parallel to the $x$-axis. ** 

 (The units of the graph are in meters.)
